data.name: BookMyRoom
data.description: It is a hotel-booking website. The application is aimed at users who frequently travel, helping them to book suitable hotels/rooms based on their preferences. The application is simplifying tasks to users to identify and book rooms that meet the requirements. It must create a personalized experience for each user, through recommendations, referral discounts and social media feeds. PWA functionality is also implemented in this app.

data.name: Restaurant and Food order Server
data.description: Developed a micro service based application to facilitate users to search favorite restaurants and order the food.

data.name: GiftCard Application
data.description: It is a Gift Card website where users can redeem, send and receive e-gift cards online from popular brands.

data.name: Airline Management System
data.description: This project is to book & change the flights and admin configuation to manage flights.

data.name: Gatsby Blogger with Netlify CMS
data.description: This Project is to create blogs without any use of database using Netlify CMS.

data.name: Broadcast Streamer
data.description: Broadcast Streaming website create using RMTP Server.
